intro: Hypoestes mollissima, commonly known as the "Snowflake" plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its striking, bi-colored leaves that resemble snowflakes. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers in shades of red, orange, and yellow, which bloom throughout the growing season. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers partial to full sunlight. Hypoestes mollissima is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique foliage and vibrant floral display.
